credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: Study of a costumed figure
medium: black, sanguine crayons, on salmon-pink paper
description: Vertical rectangle. Full-length figure of a woman in costume, standing, turned toward the right. She holds a flower in her hand; the drapery of her gown with the other hand. Part of the head is torn away, and the drawing is cut along the outline of the figures.
name: Drawing
